name: TheSilkRoad
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the silk road
des: As a lone orhpan left in the far east, can you find riches as a trader on the Silk Road? Travel far and wide and explore all the world has to offer, while trading resources and making a living as a big trader on the silk road. Watch out for bandits though, life out here is harsh. Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
